item.title: upflow anaerobic sludge blanket
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NdAXOfc-vWw Explanation of how the upflow anaerobic sludge blanket acts as a cap to allow for anaerobic decomposition of the algal mat layer and the generation of hydrogen sulfide methane.
